SEARCH
Package smeen.logic

Class MouseEventsHandler

java.lang.Object
smeen.logic.MouseEventsHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
HasEvents
public class MouseEventsHandler extends Object implements HasEvents
A class responsible for handling mouse event. Also responsible for broadcasting mouse event and checking for when sprite is mouse pressed.
